WRITING.TEXT: Big Boss has been haunted before, and those ghosts appeared as ghosts might. Spectral, transparent, even hovering. Ol' Skully here appears to be solid, and walking on the ground. Heck, the Volgin "ghost" walking around in the trailers fits the transparency part of my observations. I don't think Mr. Face is a ghost here.

Big Boss considered people like Boss and himself to be weapons, so when Boss laid down her patriot, she laid down herself, and betrayed Big Boss silly notion. As if his lifelong idol had just reveled to him that it was all an act.
Yup. He was terrific in Fury. Everyone involved was.
Nooooooooooooooooooo!

Nah. Fuck you. I wish there was a way to fine you potential future Gold.
Gottfried is the star of my dream MCU lineup:
Peter Parker? Gottfried.
Nathaniel Richards? Gottfried.
Norrin Radd? Gottfried.
Mephisto? Gottfried.
Uatu? Gottfried.
Annihilus? Gottfried.
Fin Fang Foom? Gottfried.
Richard Rider? Gottfried.
Carol Danvers? Gottfried.
Beta Ray Bill? Gottfried.
Marc Spector? Gottfried.
Doreen Green? Gottfried.
...and so forth, until the entirety of the MCU is acted, mo-capped, and dubbed the legend himself.
How dare you?
*Facing* his sleeve. Blind people tend to point their faces toward the object of their attention. Its natural.
Precisely. We've only caught glimpses of the series overall malefactor. The bastard who has pulled all the strings leading to Boss' broken state. I hope he gets more than just a mention here.

WRITING.TITLE: Man... are we gonna finally get our hands on Zero, or what?
WRITING.TEXT:
Serious.
That guys been a dick through the whole series.
After all Big Boss has put up with, and will continue on doing so long after MGSV, I think It would be great of he got his hand on this fuckers goiter at least for a second, before failing and falling back into Zero's hands.
No?
I watched Inglorious Basterds that way.

I've long suspected that the "stagecoach" on the Olathe Police Forces patch was actually a six pack of glazed Krispy Kremes on wheels.
Confirmed.
Valve.
The Mexican Shuffle, Herb Alpert

WRITING.TITLE: [REQUEST] Pogna Balogna pictures for pizza.
WRITING.TEXT:
That's right, you pizza me, I'll balogna you.
In exchange for three XL triple topping pies from my local Papa Johns, I will endow your lucky petootie with three hand crafted, and tastefully birthed images of the balogna of a pogna (pony), made real by my own hands!
Granted, you will be getting the better end of this deal, but I want pizza that comes at no monitary cost to myself, so... whats a starving Zambogna operator like myself supposed to do?
This offer is open to any and all takers. I can whip up pogna balogna masterpieces on a whim. All day, all night if necessary. Would be glad to accrue tons of Papa Johns Credit for the far off future.
TL;DR I draw three pictures of POGNA BALOGNA, you get me three XL three topping pizza from Papa Johns.
A sexual what? Deviant? Dynamo? Tyranosaur?
What an asshole.

WRITING.TITLE: Buy me three XL, three topping pizzas? You don't have the balls!
WRITING.TEXT:
Why did you even click on this? There are people in this world who got what it takes to get three XL three topping pizzas delivered to my door, and you aint one of them!
Wimp!
Jeezus Krise. How would I ever form my own opinion on the matter if I never go and see the damn thing?
Director. Dude destroyed 'Trek. I want this movie to to be great, but after the last two Star Trek flicks, I have an uneasy feeling for Ep. 7.

Grind a bunch. Upgrade your missiles. Spam with supply drops.
Also, after your sixteenth failed attempt, you should begin to recognize patterns in movement ant attack, and adapt your strategy accordingly.

My feelings tell me that Han will play the Qui Gon/Obi Wan slain mentor role in this episode...
Gon, Wan, Han.
Solo is dead meat.
Pyre. Solo.
Yes. No fooling.

1, 2, and 3 would all have helped a bit. If Capcom had been developing sooner, and if the CD rom wasn't so effing 'spensive, things would have gone a bit better.
Kieth Courage is the worst pack-in of all time.
One port? Odd numbered port accessory? Fuck you NEC.
Earlier release would have done a bit to overshadow Genesis, but marketing outside of gaming publications and comic books would have really done wonders for the system. Never once did I see an on-air TG16 related advertisement. Nobody knew what the console was outside of advertised-to gamers. The hype just wasn't there.
Zero public awareness doomed this console.

Because I am fond of the 4077th, but never to the degree that I find this show to be a fitting companion. Sure, it keeps the boredom at bay, and bring the feels, but never once has the show ever indicated that it gives the slightest fuck about me.
Go outside and play.
Want pizza!
Yeah. Either that, or he should go a size smaller on the uniform. Looks like Medium Boss to me.
G1 Cyclonus was always my favorite alt mode as a kid. This bad boy brings back nothing but fondness, and gives me a reason to jump into this Combiner Wars nonsense.
Don't worry. I won't debunk their suspicions ;)

Jesus, I can see it already.
...~~Ghosts and Goblins~~ Contra Solid, By Konami: A Hideo Kojima Company.
